verses.roman:
tāṅre vidāya dila prabhu kari' āliṅgana
ei-mata vidāya dila saba bhakta-gaṇa

synonyms: tāṅre—unto Him (Nityānanda Prabhu); vidāya dila—bade farewell; prabhu—Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; kari'-doing; āliṅgana—embracing; ei-mata—in this way; vidāya dila—bade farewell; saba—to all; bhakta-gaṇa—the devotees.
translation: In this way, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu embraced Nityānanda Prabhu and bade Him farewell. He then bade farewell to all the other devotees.
